display_long_description:
"Idle Life Horse Tycoon - Experience the Thrill of Horse Breeding in Virtual Reality!"

Step into the immersive world of horse breeding and farm management with Idle Life Horse Tycoon, designed exclusively for Meta Quest. This VR experience allows you to manage a thriving horse farm from the ground up, all in a beautifully detailed virtual environment. Start with a modest stable, care for your horses, breed new champions, and watch your farm grow.

Feel the excitement as you groom, train, and enter your horses in races, right from a first-person perspective. Customize your farm’s appearance, build larger stables, and add unique elements that make it truly your own. As you progress, unlock new breeds with unique traits and compete in virtual tournaments to prove your skills as a breeder.

With intuitive controls and immersive visuals, Idle Life Horse Tycoon brings horse farming to life like never before. Explore the freedom of VR as you grow your dream farm, one horse at a time. Are you ready to become a virtual equestrian tycoon?
